17 class SimpleRestController extends RestBaseController implements HasResourceInterface {
18 
19  public function initialize() {
20  $thisClass = \get_class ( $this );
21  if (! isset ( $this->model ))
22  $this->model = CacheManager::getRestResource ( $thisClass );
23  if (! isset ( $this->model )) {
24  $modelsNS = $this->config ["mvcNS"] ["models"];
25  $this->model = $modelsNS . "\\" . $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->getModel ( $thisClass );
26  }
27  parent::initialize ();
28  }
29 
36  public function index() {
37  parent::index ();
38  }
39 
50  public function getAll_() {
51  $filter = $this->getCondition($this->getRequestParam ( 'filter', '1=1' ));
52  $pages = null;
53  if (isset ( $_GET ['page'] )) {
54  $pageNumber = $_GET ['page'] ['number'];
55  $pageSize = $_GET ['page'] ['size'] ?? 1;
56  $pages = $this->generatePagination ( $filter, $pageNumber, $pageSize );
57  }
58  $datas = DAO::getAll ( $this->model, $filter, $this->getInclude ( $this->getRequestParam ( 'include', true ) ) );
59  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->get ( $datas, $pages );
60  }
61

72  $this->_getOne ( $id, $this->getRequestParam ( 'include', true ) );
73  }
